paper_title.en: A hybrid structure consisting of a steel beam string structure and a wooden hyperbolic paraboloidal shell reinforced by aramid fiber sheets
paper_title.ja: A HYBRID STRUCTURE CONSISTING OF A STEEL BEAM STRING STRUCTURE AND A WOODEN HYPERBOLIC PARABOLOIDAL SHELL REINFORCED BY ARAMID FIBER SHEETS

description.en: The research and development of hybrid structures have yielded few concrete results. In this report a dual-layered HP (hyperbolic paraboloidal) shell made of wooden boards is suggested. The layers are crossed relative to each other and are connected with lag screw bolts. An aramid fiber sheet is introduced into four wooden HP shells so the strength and rigidity of the shells are improved. This hybrid structure further combined with a steel beam string structure is applied to Yamadera Post Office in Yamagata Prefecture, Japan.

publication_name.en: Journal of the International Association for Shell and Spatial Structures
publication_name.ja: IASS(international association for shell and spatial structures) JOURNAL OF THE INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR SHELL AND SPATIAL STRUCTURES

paper_title.ja: キャンパス内施設配置の再構築を目指した施設整備計画の立案-東北大学工学部・工学研究科長期計画の策定過程を通して-
paper_title.en: PROPOSING A PLAN FOR RESTRUCTURING AND REARRANGEMENT OF THE CAMPUS FACILITIES : Through the process of creating the long-term plan of faculty of engineering, Tohoku university

description.ja: To avoid confusing extensions of buildings, it is necessary to make a strategic plan of the facilities based on the master plan recognized by all faculties. In this paper, we are reporting the scheme for designing a plan of campus facilities based on the process of creating The Long-term Plan of Faculty of Engineering, Tohoku University. It is aimed for renewing the campus functions, redefining the framework of the campus and rearranging of the facilities according to the changes in the social context.
description.en: To avoid confusing extensions of buildings, it is necessary to make a strategic plan of the facilities based on the master plan recognized by all faculties. In this paper, we are reporting the scheme for designing a plan of campus facilities based on the process of creating The Long-term Plan of Faculty of Engineering, Tohoku University. It is aimed for renewing the campus functions, redefining the framework of the campus and rearranging of the facilities according to the changes in the social context.

paper_title.en: SUPERVISION OF DESIGN ON THE BUILDING PROCESS OF LOCAL PUBLIC WELFARE FACILITIES - The system for design and construction on the building process of TAIWA-cho health and welfare center -

description.ja: The purpose of this paper is to report the design and construction process of TAIWA-cho health and welfare center, that has the possibility of a general model in the local public welfare facilities. In this case, we organized the supervising group besides the designers. Under the direction of the supervisor, they collaborated and supported the works that designers could not manage sufficiently. We consider that this system for design and construction is very useful in the process of bringing up new-type local public welfare facilities of which design concept has not been confirmed yet.
description.en: The purpose of this paper is to report the design and construction process of TAIWA-cho health and welfare center, that has the possibility of a general model in the local public welfare facilities. In this case, we organized the supervising group besides the designers. Under the direction of the supervisor, they collaborated and supported the works that designers could not manage sufficiently. We consider that this system for design and construction is very useful in the process of bringing up new-type local public welfare facilities of which design concept has not been confirmed yet.
